QuestData.Title: Containing the Rot
QuestData.Description: With Scourge comes death and disease. We often overlook that the wildlife of a Scourge infested area is ravaged and ultimately destroyed by rot and contagion.$B$BFor most of the indigenous beasts of the Dragonblight it is too late. The festering disease that the Scourge brings has already infected the beasts and they are now rabid and rotting.$B$BYou must venture west, towards the Pit of Narjun, and cull the infected wildlife. Check their corpses for a preserved organ as we need one to devise a vaccine.
QuestData.LogDescription: Soar Hawkfury at Agmar's Hammer in the Dragonblight wants you to kill 15 Infected Wildlife and recover a Rot Resistant Organ.
QuestData.CompletionText: Kill the beasts to prevent the spread and bring me a rot resistant organ.
QuestData.RewardText: It pains me to put animals down, but it is a service that must be performed. Now we must move on to the next step: Inoculation.
